title: All Is Well
description: A spine-chilling yet very positive story of a man’s slow acceptance of himself as a homosexual, and the extraordinary enemy he has to overcome before he can achieve his liberation.“All Is Well is a novel of, for and about sex, with some astoundingly erotic scenes that are as profound a manifesto of the right to discover and be one’s total self as any rhetoric on the essential subject that I’ve heard of or read.” John Francis Hunter THE GAY INSIDER
author: Dirk Vanden
